All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
BaseGame
This class provides the framework for a small game of Dominion.
DominionInterface
A class that implements this interface can be passed to a BaseGame and is able to receive method calls at critical times during the life-cycle of the game.
DominionTile
A DominionTile represents a single cell ("tile") on the map.
DominionTileManagerInterface
DominionTile-Manager that keeps record of the tiles in use.
Figure
This class represents an animated Figure.
GradientMap
An Extension to an IsometricMap that draws a greenish gradient background with a default isometric map setup.
Map
A map is a representation of a regular 2D-grid that is overlaid on top of a world in MapWorld and all its derived classes.
MapSprite
This class handles the connection between a regular Sprite (a graphical entity that can move freely over the world) and a MapTile (an entity representing one tile on a map).
MapSprite.SortOrder
Describes the order for sprite drawing.
MapTile
This class represent on tile on a Map.
MapTile.SelectionMode
Available selection modes for a tile.
MapWorld
A MapWord is an extension to the AbstractSpriteWorld that adds a regular grid of MapTiles into the world.
NiceTile
A MapTile with a basic outline and hover-rendering.
Sprite
This class represents an Object that can move freely over the world.
WalkingFigure
A simple figure with a walk animation.
WalkingMapSprite
 
WalkingMapSprite.Orientation
The orientation a figure is currently walking in
World
The base class of a game.
WorldObject
A class that helps managing Objects that need to reference a world.
